Package com.diffplug.gradle.oomph.thirdparty

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConventionBuildship
    Adds Buildship.
    ConventionMinimalistGradleEditor
    Adds the minimalist gradle editor.
    ConventionThirdParty
    This is a place for third-party modules to add their own configuration logic.
    ConventionTmTerminal
    Adds TmTerminal.
    WithRepoConvention
    A Convention which is setup to add a default p2 repository which can be overridden.
